sources.title: A Christmas Karen | Free Full Holiday Movie | FilmRise Movies
sources.description:
Karen is an entitled middle-aged woman whose demanding nature has alienated her neighbors and family. After a series of instances displaying her privilege and prejudice, she receives an "intervention" by some unconventional spirits. Starring Michele Simms, Meghan Colleen Moroney, and Rolin Alexis.
